cards.name: Tangle Angler
cards.originalText:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{G}: Target creature blocks Tangle Angler this turn if able.

rulings.text: A player who has ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action.
Infect’s effect applies to any damage, not just combat damage.
The -1/-1 counters remain on the creature indefinitely. They’re not removed if the creature regenerates or the turn ends.

Damage from a source with infect is damage in all respects. If the source with infect also has lifelink, damage dealt by that source also causes its controller to gain that much life. Damage from a source with infect can be prevented or redirected. Abilities that trigger on damage being dealt will trigger if a source with infect deals damage, if appropriate.

If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a player is prevented, that player doesn’t get poison counters. If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a creature is prevented, that creature doesn’t get -1/-1 counters.
Damage from a source with infect affects planeswalkers normally.
You may activate Tangle Angler’s second ability multiple times in a turn to force multiple creatures to block it.

Activating Tangle Angler’s second ability doesn’t force you to attack with Tangle Angler that turn. If it doesn’t attack, the targeted creature is free to block whichever creature its controller chooses, or block no creatures at all.

If you attack with Tangle Angler but a creature you targeted with its activated ability isn’t able to block it (for example, because an effect has granted Tangle Angler intimidate and the other creature is white), the other creature is free to block whichever creature its controller chooses, or block no creatures at all.

Tapped creatures, creatures that can’t block as the result of an effect, creatures with unpaid costs to block (such as those from War Cadence), and creatures that aren’t controlled by the defending player are exempt from effects that would require them to block. Such creatures can be targeted by Tangle Angler’s activated ability, but the requirement to block does nothing.

cards.name: Throne of Geth
cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

rulings.text: You can choose any player that has a counter, including yourself.

You can choose any permanent that has a counter, including ones controlled by opponents. You can’t choose cards in any zone other than the battlefield, even if they have counters on them, such as suspended cards or a Lightning Storm on the stack.

You don’t have to choose every permanent or player that has a counter, only the ones you want to add another counter to. Since “any number” includes zero, you don’t have to choose any permanents at all, and you don’t have to choose any players at all.
If a permanent chosen this way has multiple kinds of counters on it, only a single new counter is put on that permanent.

Players can respond to the spell or ability whose effect includes proliferating. Once that spell or ability starts to resolve, however, and its controller chooses which permanents and players will get new counters, it’s too late for anyone to respond.
You may sacrifice Throne of Geth to activate its ability.

cards.name: Thrummingbird
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

rulings.text: You can choose any player that has a counter, including yourself.

You can choose any permanent that has a counter, including ones controlled by opponents. You can’t choose cards in any zone other than the battlefield, even if they have counters on them, such as suspended cards or a Lightning Storm on the stack.

You don’t have to choose every permanent or player that has a counter, only the ones you want to add another counter to. Since “any number” includes zero, you don’t have to choose any permanents at all, and you don’t have to choose any players at all.
If a permanent chosen this way has multiple kinds of counters on it, only a single new counter is put on that permanent.

Players can respond to the spell or ability whose effect includes proliferating. Once that spell or ability starts to resolve, however, and its controller chooses which permanents and players will get new counters, it’s too late for anyone to respond.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Trigon of Infestation
cards.originalText:
Trigon of Infestation enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.
{G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Trigon of Infestation.
{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Trigon of Infestation: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token with infect onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: A player who has ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action.
Infect’s effect applies to any damage, not just combat damage.
The -1/-1 counters remain on the creature indefinitely. They’re not removed if the creature regenerates or the turn ends.

Damage from a source with infect is damage in all respects. If the source with infect also has lifelink, damage dealt by that source also causes its controller to gain that much life. Damage from a source with infect can be prevented or redirected. Abilities that trigger on damage being dealt will trigger if a source with infect deals damage, if appropriate.

If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a player is prevented, that player doesn’t get poison counters. If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a creature is prevented, that creature doesn’t get -1/-1 counters.
Damage from a source with infect affects planeswalkers normally.

foreignData.name: Plundermagier

Si vous faites ainsi, mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

cards.name: Tunnel Ignus
cards.originalText: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

rulings.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent’s control, this ability triggers only if another land had already entered the battlefield under that opponent’s control this turn. It doesn’t matter if that other land is still on the battlefield, is still under that player’s control, or is still a land.

If multiple lands enter the battlefield under an opponent’s control at the same time, Tunnel Ignus’s ability triggers that many times, even if no other lands had entered the battlefield under that player’s control earlier in the turn. That’s because each ability takes into consideration the other land(s) that entered the battlefield at the same time as the one that caused it to trigger.

cards.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

cards.name: Vector Asp
cards.originalText: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

rulings.text: A player who has ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action.
Infect’s effect applies to any damage, not just combat damage.
The -1/-1 counters remain on the creature indefinitely. They’re not removed if the creature regenerates or the turn ends.

Damage from a source with infect is damage in all respects. If the source with infect also has lifelink, damage dealt by that source also causes its controller to gain that much life. Damage from a source with infect can be prevented or redirected. Abilities that trigger on damage being dealt will trigger if a source with infect deals damage, if appropriate.

If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a player is prevented, that player doesn’t get poison counters. If damage from a source with infect that would be dealt to a creature is prevented, that creature doesn’t get -1/-1 counters.
Damage from a source with infect affects planeswalkers normally.

cards.text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

cards.originalText:
You have no maximum hand size.

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Venser’s Journal onto the battlefield, you’ll have no maximum hand size. However, if those permanents enter the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

cards.name: Venser, the Sojourner
cards.originalText:
+2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
-1: Creatures are unblockable this turn.
-8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

rulings.text: Emblems behave similarly to enchantments: They have an ability that, in a general sense, continually affects the game. The primary difference between them is that emblems aren’t permanents and don’t exist on the battlefield. Nothing in the game can remove an emblem, simply because no other spell or ability references them. Once you get an emblem, you keep it for the rest of the game. Emblems have no color, name, card type, or other characteristics beyond the listed ability.
The first ability can target any permanent you own, including those another player controls.
If the first ability exiles a token, that token will cease to exist. It won’t return to the battlefield.
A permanent exiled by the first ability will return to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step even if you no longer control Venser at that time.

Venser’s second ability doesn’t lock in what it applies to. That’s because the effect states a true thing about creatures, but doesn’t actually change the characteristics of those creatures. As a result, all creatures can’t be blocked that turn, including creatures you don’t control, creatures that weren’t on the battlefield at the time the ability resolved, and creatures that have lost all abilities.

Venser’s last ability creates an emblem with a triggered ability. The emblem is the source of the triggered ability. Because emblems are colorless, you can target permanents with protection from white or from blue, for example, with the triggered ability.
Whenever you cast a spell, the emblem’s ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of it. It will resolve before the spell does.
If you control more than one such emblem, each one’s ability will trigger separately whenever you cast a spell.

cards.flavorText: Rootlike fibers travel far from Mirrodin's metallic forests, emerging from the crust to drink in the mana-infused sunlight.

foreignData.flavorText: Wurzelartige Stränge verbreiten sich von den metallischen Wäldern Mirrodins in alle Richtungen und schieben sich an die Oberfläche, um manaerfülltes Sonnenlicht zu tanken.
foreignData.name: Knäuelstrangmauer
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
{G}: Die Knäuelstrangmauer erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges Reichweite. (Sie kann fliegende Kreaturen blocken.)

foreignData.flavorText: Fibras como raíces viajan lejos de los bosques metálicos de Mirrodin y emergen de la corteza para beber el maná de la luz solar.
foreignData.name: Muro de cuerdamaraña
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
{G}: El Muro de cuerdamaraña gana la habilidad de alcance hasta el final del turno. (Puede bloquear criaturas con la habilidad de volar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ses racines fibreuses se répandent loin des forêts métalliques de Mirrodin, perçant la croute terrestre pour absorber les rayons des soleils chargés de mana.
foreignData.name: Mur de lianes de Filandre
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
{G} : Le Mur de lianes de Filandre acquiert la portée jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Il peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le fibre simili a radici si allontanano molto dalle foreste metalliche di Mirrodin, spuntando dalla crosta per dissetarsi nella luce solare infusa di mana.
foreignData.name: Muro di Corde del Groviglio
foreignData.text:
Difensore
{G}: Il Muro di Corde del Groviglio ha raggiungere fino alla fine del turno. (Può bloccare le creature con volare.)

foreignData.flavorText: ミラディンの金属の森から伸びてきた根のような繊維は、マナの込められた陽の光を飲み込むために地面から伸び上がっている。
foreignData.name: 絡み線の壁
foreignData.text:
防衛
{G}：絡み線の壁はターン終了時まで到達を得る。 （それは飛行を持つクリーチャーをブロックできる。）
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 壁

foreignData.flavorText: Suas fibras, semelhantes a raízes, vão muito além das florestas metálicas de Mirrodin e emergem da crosta para absorver a luz do sol repleta de mana.

foreignData.text:
Defensor
{G}: Barreira de Corda do Emaranhado ganha alcance até o final do turno. (Ela pode bloquear criaturas com voar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Похожие на корни волокна расползаются далеко за пределы металлических лесов Мирродина, пробиваясь сквозь земную кору, чтобы впитать наполненный маной солнечный свет.
foreignData.name: Стена Зарослевых Корней
foreignData.text:
Защитник
{G}: Стена Зарослевых Корней получает Захват до конца хода. (Она может блокировать существа с Полетом.)

foreignData.flavorText: 如树根的细索远自秘罗地的金属树林而来，破开地表好畅饮灌注魔力的阳光。
foreignData.name: 铬铜索墙

守军

foreignData.flavorText: 如樹根的細索遠自秘羅地的金屬樹林而來，破開地表好暢飲灌注魔力的陽光。
foreignData.name: 鉻銅索牆
foreignData.text:
守軍
{G}：鉻銅索牆獲得延勢異能直到回合結束。 （它能阻擋具飛行異能的生物。）

cards.name: Wall of Tanglecord

Defender

cards.text:
Defender
{G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

cards.flavorText: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

foreignData.flavorText: In der gesamten Gegend der Rasierklingenfelder wird die Weiße Sonne gefeiert. Selbst die Anhänger des Rebellen Juryan, die weit von der Höhle des Lichts entfernt leben, verneigen sich in Verehrung.
foreignData.name: Weg der Weißen Sonne
foreignData.text: Du erhältst 5 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: En todos los rincones de los Campos Navaja se celebra Solblanco. Hasta los seguidores del rebelde Juryan, lejos de la Cueva de la Luz, bajan sus cabezas en reverencia.
foreignData.name: Rito de Solblanco
foreignData.text: Gana 5 vidas.

foreignData.flavorText: Partout dans les Champs de Rasoirs, Blancsoleil est vénéré. Même les adeptes du rebelle Juryan, loin de la Caverne de lumière, baissent la tête en signe de respect.
foreignData.name: Passage de Blancsoleil
foreignData.text: Vous gagnez 5 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Ovunque nei Campi Taglienti, viene celebrato il Solebianco. Perfino i seguaci del ribelle Juryan, lontano dalla Caverna della Luce, chinano la testa per rispetto.
foreignData.name: Passaggio di Solebianco
foreignData.text: Guadagni 5 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 剃刀ヶ原全土で、白の太陽は褒め称えられている。 光の洞窟を遥か離れた反乱者ジュリアンの信奉者ですら、畏敬に頭を垂れる。
foreignData.name: 白の太陽の通過
foreignData.text: あなたは５点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: O Sol Branco é celebrado por toda parte nos Campos Cortantes. Até mesmo os seguidores do rebelde Juryan, que vivem muito longe da Caverna de Luz, curvam-se em sinal de reverência.
foreignData.name: Passagem do Sol Branco
foreignData.text: Você ganha 5 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Повсюду в Бритвенных Полях отмечается праздник Белосолнца. Даже последователи повстанца Джурана, вдалеке от Пещеры Света, почтительно склоняют головы.
foreignData.name: Прохождение Белосолнца
foreignData.text: Вы получаете 5 жизней.

foreignData.flavorText: 在锐草原野全境，白阳都受人崇敬。 就连远离明光洞窟去追随哲扬的叛军，也会低头敬拜。
foreignData.name: 白阳仪式
foreignData.text: 你获得5点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 在銳草原野全境，白陽都受人崇敬。 就連遠離明光洞窟去追隨哲揚的叛軍，也會低頭敬拜。
foreignData.name: 白陽儀式
foreignData.text: 你獲得5點生命。

cards.name: Whitesun's Passage
cards.originalText: You gain 5 life.
cards.text: You gain 5 life.

cards.flavorText: "If I were the air, I wouldn't taunt the ground. It has the weight advantage." —Konnos, Sylvok sage

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn ich die Luft wäre, würde ich den Boden nicht verspotten. Er kämpft in einer deutlich höheren Gewichtsklasse." —Konnos, weiser Sylvok
foreignData.name: Flügeldurchstich
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, fügt einer fliegenden Kreatur deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Si yo fuera el aire, no provocaría al suelo. Tiene la ventaja de ser más pesado." —Konnos, sabio sylvok
foreignData.name: Perforar el ala
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo que controlas hace daño igual a su fuerza a la criatura objetivo con la habilidad de volar.

foreignData.flavorText: « Si j'étais l'air, je ne narguerais pas la terre. Elle a l'avantage du poids. » —Konnos, sage sylvok
foreignData.name: Perforation d'aile
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée que vous contrôlez inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à une créature avec le vol ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: "Se fossi l'aria, non deriderei la terra. Ha un pesante vantaggio." —Konnos, saggio Sylvok
foreignData.name: Perforare Ala
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio che controlli infligge danno pari alla sua forza a una creatura bersaglio con volare.

foreignData.flavorText: 「わしが空なら、地を嘲りはせぬ。 重い分有利なのだから。」 ――シルヴォクの賢者、コノス
foreignData.name: 風の突き刺し
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体と、飛行を持つクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "Se eu fosse o ar, não provocaria a terra. Ela tem o peso como vantagem." — Konnos, sábio silvoque
foreignData.name: Punção de Asas
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo que você controla causa dano igual ao seu poder à criatura alvo com voar.

foreignData.flavorText: «Если бы я был воздухом, то не насмехался бы над землей. Она-то покрепче будет». — Коннос, сильвокский мудрец
foreignData.name: Прокол Крыла
foreignData.text: Целевое существо под вашим контролем наносит повреждения, равные своей силе, целевому существу с Полетом.

foreignData.flavorText: 「如果我是空气，就不会挑衅大地。 它有着重量优势。」 ～希沃克智者科诺斯

foreignData.text: 目标由你操控的生物对目标具飞行异能的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

foreignData.flavorText: 「如果我是空氣，就不會挑釁大地。 它有著重量優勢。」 ～希沃克智者科諾斯
foreignData.name: 穿刺羽翼
foreignData.text: 目標由你操控的生物對目標具飛行異能的生物造成傷害，其數量等同於前者的力量。

cards.name: Wing Puncture
cards.originalText: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

rulings.text: If either target has become illegal by the time Wing Puncture resolves, the spell will still resolve but have no effect. If the first target is illegal, it can’t perform any actions, so it can’t deal damage. If the second target is illegal, there’s nothing for the first target to deal damage to. If both targets have become illegal, the spell won’t resolve.

cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

cards.flavorText: On Mirrodin, every conflict ends in either death or darksteel.

foreignData.flavorText: Auf Mirrodin endet jeder Konflikt entweder mit dem Tod oder mit Nachtstahl.
foreignData.name: Dem Tod widerstehen
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ist in diesem Zug unzerstörbar. (Tödlicher Schaden und Zerstörungseffekte zerstören sie nicht. Falls ihre Widerstandskraft 0 oder weniger beträgt, wird sie dennoch auf den Friedhof ihres Besitzers gelegt.)

foreignData.flavorText: En Mirrodin, todos los conflictos terminan con la muerte o con acero oscuro.
foreignData.name: Soportar la muerte
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo es indestructible este turno. (Los efectos que dicen "destruir" y el daño letal no la destruyen. Si su resistencia es 0 o menos, irá al cementerio de su propietario igualmente.)

foreignData.flavorText: Sur Mirrodin, tout conflit se termine soit par la mort, soit par le sombracier.
foreignData.name: Ténacité devant la mort
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée est indestructible ce tour-ci. (Les blessures mortelles et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne la détruisent pas. Si son endurance est inférieure ou égale à 0, elle est toujours mise dans le cimetière de son propriétaire.)

foreignData.flavorText: Su Mirrodin, ogni scontro termina con la morte o col darksteel.
foreignData.name: Resistere alla Morte
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio è indistruttibile in questo turno. (Il danno letale e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non la distruggono. Se la sua costituzione è pari o inferiore a 0, viene comunque messa nel cimitero del suo proprietario.)

foreignData.flavorText: ミラディンでは、あらゆる争いは死かダークスティールで終わる。
foreignData.name: 死への抵抗
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それは破壊されない。 （致死ダメージや"破壊する"効果ではそれは破壊されない。 それのタフネスが０以下である場合は、それはオーナーの墓地に置かれる。）

foreignData.flavorText: Em Mirrodin, todos os conflitos acabam em morte ou em aço negro.
foreignData.name: Resistir à Morte
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo é indestrutível neste turno. (Nem dano letal nem efeitos que dizem "destrua" podem destruí-la. Se a sua resistência for menor ou igual a 0, ela ainda será colocada no cemitério de seu dono.)

foreignData.flavorText: На Мирродине каждое столкновение заканчивается либо смертью, либо темной сталью.
foreignData.name: Устоять Перед Смертью
foreignData.text: Целевое существо не может быть уничтожено в этом ходу. (Смертельные повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его. Если же его выносливость равна 0 или меньше, оно все равно помещается на кладбище своего владельца.)

foreignData.flavorText: 在秘罗地，每场争斗最后剩下的不是死亡就是玄铁。
foreignData.name: 抵御死亡
foreignData.text: 目标生物本回合中不会毁坏。 （致命伤害以及注明「消灭」的效应都不会将它消灭。 如果其防御力降到0或更少，它仍会置入其拥有者的坟墓场。）

foreignData.flavorText: 在秘羅地，每場爭鬥最後剩下的不是死亡就是玄鐵。
foreignData.name: 抵禦死亡
foreignData.text: 目標生物本回合中不會毀壞。 （致命傷害以及註明「消滅」的效應都不會將它消滅。 如果其防禦力降到0或更少，它仍會置入其擁有者的墳墓場。）

cards.name: Withstand Death
cards.originalText: Target creature is indestructible this turn. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
cards.text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

foreignData.name: Wurmspiralmaschine
foreignData.text:
Todensberührung, Lebensverknüpfung
Wenn die Wurmspiralmaschine aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, bringe einen 3/3 farblosen Wurm-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Todesberührung und einen 3/3 farblosen Wurm-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Lebensverknüpfung ins Spiel.

foreignData.name: Motor sierpespiral
foreignData.text:
Toque mortal, vínculo vital.
Cuando el Motor sierpespiral vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura artefacto Sierpe incolora 3/3 con la habilidad de toque mortal y una ficha de criatura artefacto Sierpe incolora 3/3 con la habilidad de vínculo vital.

foreignData.name: Machine guivrétreinte
foreignData.text:
Contact mortel, lien de vie
Quand la Machine guivrétreinte est mise dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature-artefact 3/3 incolore Guivre avec le contact mortel et un jeton de créature-artefact 3/3 incolore Guivre avec le lien de vie.

foreignData.name: Macchina dei Wurm Attorcigliati
foreignData.text:
Tocco letale, legame vitale
Quando la Macchina dei Wurm Attorcigliati viene messa in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura artefatto Wurm 3/3 incolore con tocco letale e una pedina creatura artefatto Wurm 3/3 incolore con legame vitale.

foreignData.name: ワームとぐろエンジン
foreignData.text:
接死、絆魂
ワームとぐろエンジンが戦場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、接死を持つ無色の３/３のワーム・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを１体と、絆魂を持つ無色の３/３のワーム・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ワーム

foreignData.name: Máquina a Vorme Espiralado
foreignData.text:
Toque mortífero, vínculo com a vida
Quando Máquina a Vorme Espiralado for colocado num cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura artefato incolor 3/3 do tipo Vorme com toque mortífero e uma ficha de criatura artefato incolor 3/3 do tipo Vorme com vínculo com a vida.

foreignData.name: Машина Свитых Вурмов
foreignData.text:
Смертельное касание, Цепь жизни
Когда Машина Свитых Вурмов попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, положите на поле битвы одну фишку артефактного существа 3/3 бесцветный Вурм со Смертельным касанием и одну фишку артефактного существа 3/3 бесцветный Вурм с Цепью жизни.

foreignData.name: 亚龙卷引擎
foreignData.text:
死触，系命
当亚龙卷引擎从战场进入坟墓场时，将一个3/3无色、具死触异能的亚龙神器生物衍生物，以及一个3/3绿色、具系命异能的亚龙神器生物衍生物放进战场。

foreignData.name: 亞龍捲引擎
foreignData.text:
死觸，繫命
當亞龍捲引擎從戰場進入墳墓場時，將一個3/3無色、具死觸異能的亞龍衍生神器生物，以及一個3/3無色、具繫命異能的亞龍衍生神器生物放進戰場。

cards.name: Wurmcoil Engine
cards.originalText:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Wurmcoil Engine is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: The two creature tokens enter the battlefield at the same time.
It must be clear to all players which token has deathtouch and which token has lifelink.

cards.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

tokens.name: Poison Counter
tokens.text: (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
